'''0.24_SURVIVAL_TEST_01''' is a version of [[Java Edition Classic]] released on September 1, 2009, at 17:12 UTC to try (unsuccessfully) to fix a crash bug.<ref name="fix">[[#logs|IRC logs]]: "''P12:01:17 <PuyoDead> oh great, it crashed already''" [...] "''P12:09:54 <08Notch> PuyoDead: I'm trying a fix''" [...] "''P12:14:07 <08Notch> PuyoDead: Try now''" [...] "''P12:15:17 <PuyoDead> Notch: nope, it still crashed exactly the same''" (17:01 to 17:15 UTC)</ref>

== Fixes ==
* Tried to fix a crash bug.
** The fix was not successful.<ref name="fix"/>
